media.description: Preview for Hanamaru Kindergarten with a few scenes not included (or different) in the anime.

title.romaji: Watashi ga Motenai no wa Dou Kangaetemo Omaera ga Warui!
title.english: Watamote: No Matter How I Look at It, It’s You Guys' Fault I’m Not Popular

media.description:
Kuroki Tomoko is a super popular, high school girl who has had 50 years of dating experience and 100 boys... in the Otome game world. In the real world, she is a 15-year-old shut in who has all of the qualities of a "mojo" (a gloomy or unpopular woman).

However, when school isn't going as she expected, and she isn't as popular as she had thought she was, she takes a look at herself in the mirror for the first time in a few years, and has some shocking revelations...

(Source: MU)

media.description: An animated Korean movie about a monster invasion.
A Korean animated film taking place in the same universe as Robot Taekwon V. It tells the story of the lone spaceship and its mission to save the Earth.
A Korean anti-communist animated movie.
A Korean super hero movie.

Every 333 years the ultimate universal devil known as "Kuiba" is reborn. With each rebirth, Kuiba brings absolute destruction. In order to battle Kuiba, Deities and people team up and assassinate him just before his revival. In 1664, the year of Kuiba's rebirth, the assassination attempt failed. Kuiba managed to slip into the young body of Manji. As the child grew older, Manji grew a strong desire to become the greatest warrior. When Manji hears the armies of Earth are recruiting to battle Kuiba, Manji and his master enlists to find and fight Kuiba. What he doesn't know is the one he is aiming to destroy is himself. How will he face his fate and accept his destiny?

Bundled with the brand-new Future Diary Redial (Mirai Nikki Redial) manga volume.

(Source: ANN)

The story deals with those in this world who dwell in the dark, invisible to the naked eye. From time to time, these figures bare their fangs and attack people. Inferno Cop is a messenger of justice who came from the depths of hell to protect people from them.

(Source: ANN)

streamingEpisodes.title: Episode 7 - Inferno, an incident in Hell
Episode 9 - Rest in peace, my friend
Episode 14 - Inferno Cop "Die Hollen Polizei" Karaoke

media.description:
Yuuki has to move from Yokohama to a rural city and becomes the target of bullying.

(Source: AniDB)
A Korean animated movie about the boy and his alien friend possessing supernatural powers.
The movie is about a caveman tribe struggling against the mighty tyrannosaurus and a family from the modern times which gets sent back in time because of the Bermuda Triangle.

We have met, for each of us to walk forward.

Takao, who is training to become a shoemaker, skipped school and is sketching shoes in a Japanese-style garden. He meets a mysterious woman, Yukino, who is older than him. Then, without arranging the times, the two start to see each other again and again, but only on rainy days. They deepen their relationship and open up to each other. But the end of the rainy season soon approaches...

(Source: Comix Wave)
A Korean animated movie mixing Mecha with anti-communist themes.

title.romaji: Sengoku Bushou Retsuden Bakufuu Douji Hissatsuman

media.description: A Korean animated movie about three kids protecting humanity along with their giant robot.
When evil Doctor Butler uses his Dark Energy to throw the world into the state of chaos, three heroes enter the electronic world to capture him and save humanity.
A boy finds a toy robot which turns out to not to be an ordinary toy.
Kunta and his pet pelican set out on a journey to save the mysterious girl.
Three kids find themselves in the middle of a nightmare, as the world is about to be taken over by the powers of evil.
A group of kids try to save the galaxy with their giant robot.
The titular hero sets out on a journey to the underworld.
A young man is looking for his kidnapped family.

title.english: Son Goku War and the Stars

media.description: The story of the galactic hero Goku.
A Korean adaptation of the biblical story of David and Goliath.
After pollution of the Earth's environment reaches the dangerous level, a small group of people embarks on a space journey to find a new place to live.
The story of a young boy who uses his electric super powers to help the innocent.
The story of an orphaned boy who practices baseball to deal with his loneliness.
In the year 2100 the Earth is once again in danger. The group of brave teenagers set out in their giant robot to save humanity.
A movie adaptation of Heo Gyun's novel, The Tale Of Hong Gildong, taking the character into science-fiction setting.
A movie taking place in the same universe as Solar I.II.III. Once again, a group of teenagers save the world with their giant robot.
A Korean adaptation of Erich Kästner's novel. Two girls separated after birth meet each other after years, finding out that they're sisters.

title.romaji: Tonari no Kaibutsu-kun: Tonari no Gokudou-kun

media.description: Bundled with the limited edition of the 12th volume of the manga.
Bundled with the 11th volume of manga.

The moon is beginning to fall, and at the rate it's going, it is doomed to fall on the Earth. The countdown for the survival of the planet begins. Among the havoc, Hinata's younger sister Hanabi is captured by the mysterious enemy, Toneri Ootsutsuki. Naruto must overcome great danger on a mission to save Hanabi and the world along with Hinata, Sai, Shikamaru, and Sakura is their final story. "The final story is a first love."

(Source: ANN)

The story revolves around William, an aristocratic family's progeny with rare intellect. One day, his uncle lost his possessions after his business failed. Fearing that his family's name has been tarnished, William returns home and searches with his family's butler for anything that can be converted into cash. A search of the premises yields an underground room left by an ancestor. In the room is a magical seal, and William unintentionally summons a devil. The summoned devil tells William his name Dantalion, and reveals that William is the designator who can choose the acting ruler of the demon world.

(Source: ANN)

streamingEpisodes.title: Episode 6 - Pillar 6 - The One Who Schemes

media.description:
With the Interhigh Championship finally over, Seirin's basketball team refocuses their efforts, training harder than ever to get the chance to participate in the Winter Cup. Both Kuroko and Kagami see old friends walk back into their lives, providing a challenge both on and off the court.

As new skills are developed and new alliances created, enemies from various teams—giants of high school basketball such as Yousen, Shuutoku and Touou—stand in the way of Seirin's steadfast attempts to get to the top. All of these schools prove to be formidable foes whose abilities progress exponentially, while Kuroko struggles to find a balance between his resolve to play as part of a team and his desire to win.

With old wounds reopening, new challenges to face on the court, and a new set of foes—the "Uncrowned Kings"—vowing to defeat the new hopefuls, will Seirin ever be able to achieve their dream of beating the Generation of Miracles?

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

media.description:
Ever since the School Island Incident, in which the four Kings were involved, the Silver Clansman, Kuroh Yatogami and Neko were on their search for their master Shiro. Unable to find any leads to Shiro, the two were in a gloomy mood until they ran into Homura members, Rikio Kamamoto and Anna Kushima, who were apparently being chased by someone...

(Source: Official Movie Pamphlet)

The anime shorts are set in the fictional Line Corporation with a motley crew of idiosyncratic workers. There is the narcissistic section head and president's son James, the subsection head Moon (who is always gone somewhere but somehow gets his work done), the quiet but kindhearted subsection head Brown, and the subordinate Connie who is in an endless loop of yo-yo diets and weight gains.

(Source: ANN)

In an odd dimensional bubble inside the kettle of an Oden food cart exists Oden village. The residents of Oden village spend their idyllic days waiting for customers to come and eat them. In the meantime, Oden-kun helps other troubled dwellers to realize their dreams. One day, he hears that a customer's mother suffers from cancer so he leaves the kettle and after being eaten, faces the cancer cell Gannosuke. Oden-kun's dream is to meet his own mother. Looking forward to this day, Oden-kun spends his days doing one good deed a day.

(Source: ANN)

Mukoujima Takurou is a lonely teenager who spends his time fishing at the pier and, to his incredible surprise, fishes up Muromi, a mermaid. Muromi first off doesn't realize she's a mermaid until she meets Takurou. Not only that, she is incredibly dense and crazy and has a drinking problem to top it off. Now every time Takurou goes fishing, Muromi appears and makes life interesting for him.

(Source: MU)

media.description:
Based on the erotic game by Syrup: Honey Sweet.

A younger brother who had been caught by Onee-chan because he was watching Hentai Machi Gurumi without desire and refused to acknowledge his actions, and finally Onee-chan helped his younger brother to release his passionate passion with sex with his own Onee-chan...

(Source: Nekopoi and Has Been Translated and Edited)

Episode 22.5 bundled with BD/DVD volume 8.

The episode covers Kuroko's past, when he was part of the "Generation of Miracles".
